amendment.description: To extend the prohibition on certain reductions to B-1 bomber aircraft squadrons.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3274 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3274 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3748. To extend the prohibition on certain reductions to B-1 bomber aircraft squadrons.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3274 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3274 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
